Traceroute Module¶

This is the main module for Traceroute portion of homework

my_traceroute.form_pkt()¶

Forms packet for traceroute program by using raw sockets

Returns:

pkt, a crafted packet using scapy raw sockets

Return type:

scapy.layers.inet.IP / scapy.layers.inet.ICMP

my_traceroute.setup_parser()¶

Sets up the argument parser for the traceroute program

Returns:

parser, an initialized ArgumentParser object

Return type:

ArgumentParser

my_traceroute.trace(pkt, args, line_break)¶

Performs traceroute with given packet and args

Parameters:

  • pkt (scapy.layers.inet.IP / scapy.layers.inet.ICMP) – A packet formed with scapy raw sockets

  • args (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object with parsed arguments

  • line_break (str) – string object used for printing purposes

Returns:

probe_addresses, sets of IP addresses traceroute touches

Return type:

Array of sets

Returns:

failed_probes, array tracking # of probes answered each hop

Return type:

Array of int

    • trace()
